constraints.name: king_shaman_power
constraints.description: 一个萨满可以成为国王萨满，当且仅当他的魔法力量等于所有前驱萨满的魔法力量之和。
constraints.formal: a[i] == sum(a[j] for j in range(1, i)) if a[i] is a king-shaman

constraints.name: power_update
constraints.description: 每次更新操作会改变某个萨满的魔法力量，并需要重新判断是否存在国王萨满。
constraints.formal: a[p_i] = x_i; check for king-shaman after each update
